page.title: 10A TEENAGERS WEEKEND IN FENCE
page.content: Friday is a good night.There is the Fence youth club; its 35p.An adult is in charge.People aged 12-18 go.We play pool,tabletennis.We also listen to music.After the youth club we'd either go home or hang around the village.On Saturday i get up have a big breakfast ,get dressed call on my friends get my Â£4.00 pocket money and go to Burnley town on the bus.Saturday nights are ace .In summer we can go camping and stay up till 4am. In winter we just stay in.A Sunday in Fence is boring.No shops are open.We sometimes go on rides to Barley.If its hot we swim at Barley in a river.Its about 2 miles away.Where we swim its about height of a 1st year. Sunday evenings are even more boring it consists of watching T.V. Homework has to be done of course.
